sentence.Network_en: Chivalry, pure and passionless women, unearthly beauty, some high southern fantasy possessed them.
sentence.Network_cn: 侠义的作风, 纯朴而不动情的女人, 超自然的美, 这些南方的幻想占有了他们.

sentence.Network_en: Chivalry, pure and passionless women, unearthly beauty: the high Southern fantasy possessed them.
sentence.Network_cn: 侠义的作风, 纯洁而不动情的女人, 超自然的美: 这些南方的幻想占有了他们.

sentence.Network_en: I tell you hopeless grief is passionless. ( E . B . Browning , British poetess )
sentence.Network_cn: 我告诉你,没有希望的悲伤是没有激情的. ( 英国女诗人布朗宁 )

PerfectNetExp.abs: 有什么以less结尾的单词么..？_百度知道 ... paperless 无纸的 passionless 不热情的 penniless 身无分文的.
I tell you hopeless grief is passionless ., 我告诉你没有希望的悲伤是没有感情的.
world . you know , architecture is passionless in the modern movement . there was no sense of I mean ;你知道，现代主义运动中的建筑是没有激情的。它没有感觉，我指。
没趣味的chippy没热情的passionless没人管的uncared-for

list.abs: A rather passionless plea for clemency ., 毫无感情的请求宽容.
Chivalry , pure and passionless women , unearthly beauty , some high southern fantasy possessed them ., 侠义的作风 , 纯朴而不动情的女人 , 超自然的美 , 这些南方的幻想占有了他们.

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as passionless, you mean that they do not have or show strong feelings.

example.tran: 他们已经结束的那段明显毫无激情的婚姻

sentences.sentence: "he kept his emotionless objectivity and faith in the cause he served"
"this passionless girl was like an icicle in the sunshine"-Margaret Deland

auth_sentence.content: Every tale was told in the even, passionless voice of the native-born.
auth_sentence.res_content: Every tale was told in the even, passionless voice of the native-born.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every tale was told in the even, passionless voice of the native-born.

auth_sentence.content: Living in the calm eye of the storm, passionless and rational, we can see both extremes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Living in the calm eye of the storm, passionless and rational, we can see both extremes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Living in the calm eye of the storm, passionless and rational, we can see both extremes.
